Advisors.title: Co-Founder
Advisors.bio: JJ is a full-stack JavaScript web and mobile developer with over 10 years of experience. He is formely CTO of Merscient Inc, a loyalty and e-learning company with clients such as IBM, GE, and Castrol. JJ graduated from UofT with a B.Sc in Computer Science. He’s obsessed with turning his love of delicious baked goods and technology into a billion dollar business.

Advisors.title: Director, Enterprise
Advisors.bio: Ben is a Director at Sitescout and has 10+ years of experience in Enterprise SaaS sales and operations. Prior to that, Ben was an Account Manager for Randstad Canada's technology recruiting division. Ben graduated from Wilfrid Laurier University with a B.A in Political Science. His heroes are Justin Bieber and Drake, in that order.

Advisors.title: Business Lawyer
Advisors.bio: Trevor is a business lawyer with the global law firm Norton Rose Fulbright Canada LLP, where he specializes in corporate finance and M&A. Trevor attended the University of Windsor and the London School of Economics where he attained his JD and LLM, respectively. When he’s not closing multi-million dollar deals he can be found sobbing at the latest Toronto Raptors loss.

Advisors.title: Web Developer
Advisors.bio: JJ is a full-stack JavaScript developer with over 10 years of experience as a CTO and solutions architect. He has worked on projects for clients such as IBM, GE and Castrol Wakefield. JJ graduated from UofT with a B.Sc in Computer Science. He’s obsessed with turning his love of delicious baked goods and technology into a billion dollar business.
